title: Is this font some variation of DIN?
content:
Hi guys,  
Is this font some variation of DIN?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [\_ 111.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416053525/http:/typophile.com/files/_%20111.jpg) | 9.86 KB |
author: uzapucax

comments.content:
Like a great number of modern sans serifs, it owes a debt to DIN.

Appears to be Geogrotesque, by Emtype (based in Barcelona):  
 [http://www.emtype.net/geogrotesque\_01.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416053525/http:/www.emtype.net/geogrotesque_01.php "http://www.emtype.net/geogrotesque\_01.php")
Thanks kthomps5! indeed it look like Geogrotesque ;-)
